name: RogueSnake
description:
This is a submission for UDC#17 a monthly jam from the Unity Dev Community. When snake meet a dungeon crawler. Level up, fight monsters, collect potions and gold, upgrade to merchant, and climb the dungeon !

Made in collaboration with Pranderson#0042 https://lavande-potions.itch.io/
A browser playable version of the game can be found here :

https://lavande-potions.itch.io/rogue-snake
